import{useState,useEffect}from"react";/**
 * Custom hook for debouncing values
 * @param value - The value to debounce
 * @param delay - The delay in milliseconds
 * @returns The debounced value
 */export function useDebounce(value,delay){const[debouncedValue,setDebouncedValue]=useState(value);useEffect(()=>{const handler=setTimeout(()=>{setDebouncedValue(value);},delay);return()=>{clearTimeout(handler);};},[value,delay]);return debouncedValue;}
